name: MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionGroup
desc: A grouped set of language options where only a single language option can be active at a time.

items.name: init(languageOptions: [MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption], defaultLanguageOption: MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption?, allowEmptySelection: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a new language option group with the supplied language options.

items.name: var allowEmptySelection: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether selecting a language option in the group is required at all times.

items.name: var defaultLanguageOption: MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption?
items.desc: The default language option for the group.

items.name: var languageOptions: [MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption]
items.desc: The available language options for the group.
